item.description:
The elements are around us and a part of us, and by connecting with them it will help to bring you to a higher spiritual understanding....”

Come and spend a day learning about and connecting with the elemental spirits of the four elements: Air, Fire, Earth and Water.

We will physically experience each element, in various nearby locations and have a lecture and discussion about each one.

You will learn to call to them and ask them to lend their energies, and connect with them intimately through a guided meditation for each one.

Finally we will offer our thanks, and give an offering to each direction.

Class will be from 11:00 am- 4:00 pm

$35.00 per person, lunch will be included at 1:00 pm- Paperwork included :)

(variety of sandwiches homemade chicken, ham & cheese,tuna & egg salad, chips and pickle, dessert on 2nd break :)

Cash or checks will be accepted the day of the class

Please dress comfortably, with good walking shoes as we will be taking a walk through

the woods to a waterfall.
item.name: Connecting With The Spirits of the Earth
